name: 25 Assorted 1" Pinback Buttons
description: This is a bag of 25 assorted 1” buttons made by boygirlbuttons. These are not some rusted old buttons that somebody’s mother found at an estate sale. These are freakin’ new buttons that we just made ourselves. Our buttons easily resell for $1.00 to $1.50 each. This picture is just an example of the kind of buttons we make. The actual buttons that you recieve will vary. Some buttons may depict nudity, drug references, obscene language, or other inappropriate material. If you wish to not recieve dirty buttons then please choose the “CLEAN BUTTONS” option. The button designs come from various periodicals, books, brochures, or whatever we can get our hands on. Some of the designs come from our own drawings or photographs. We do not mass-produce the buttons so there are only, if any, a few copies (sometimes if we really like an image we’ll hunt down another copy of the source) of any button. EVERY BUTTON YOU RECEIVE WILL BE DIFFERENT.
